channel.title: Full Body Chills
channel.description: Ever miss those spooky campfire stories you heard growing up? Well, gather round... and listen close.
channel.itunes:summary: Ever miss those spooky campfire stories you heard growing up? Well, gather round... and listen close.
channel.itunes:author: audiochuck

item.title: Something's Coming

item.title: Every Year on My Birthday, I Receive a Letter
item.description:
Every year on my birthday I get a letter. I never feared death before but these letters have changed everything for me.

Every year on my birthday, I receive a letter.

by: Richard Saxon

You can read the original story at FullBodyChillsPodcast.com
